articles.title: New Parkinson's drug Produodopa to be available on NHS - BBC.com
articles.description: The treatment will mean many people no longer needing to take more than 20 pills across the day.
articles.content:
By Aurelia FosterHealth reporter
The drugs work by helping the brain transmit messages to nerves that control movement

articles.title: Unlocking Cell Death Secrets: Lipids Key to Ferroptosis Control - Neuroscience News
articles.description: Researchers have made a groundbreaking discovery, identifying a rare lipid as a crucial factor in ferroptosis, a unique form of cell death.
articles.content: Summary: Researchers have made a groundbreaking discovery, identifying a rare lipid as a crucial factor in ferroptosis, a unique form of cell death. This lipid, characterized by its two polyunsaturat… [+5423 chars]
